content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Automation Science Pack Production Line at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine-1 at (8.5, 13.5)
- Output inserter (burner) at (10.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Iron gear input inserter at (7.5, 16.5)
- Iron gear chest at (7.5, 17.5)
- Copper input inserter at (9.5, 18.5)
- Copper chest at (9.5, 19.5)

### Power Generation System at (-4.5, 16.0)
Consists of:
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0)
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe networks (fluid systems 4236, 4244)
- Electric pole network connecting power consumers

### Iron Plate Production Lines
Multiple production lines consisting of:
1. First line:
   - Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
   - Input chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
   - Input inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
   - Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0)
   - Output inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)
   - Output chest at (-22.5, -58.5)

2. Second line:
   - Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0)
   - Input chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
   - Input inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
   - Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0)
   - Output inserter at (-13.5, -50.5)
   - Output chest at (-12.5, -50.5)

### Coal Mining System at (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0)
- Output chest at (41.5, -80.5)
- Inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Collision Errors
- Check for existing entities before placing new ones
- Increase spacing or change direction when placing entities near existing structures
- Pay attention to error messages that indicate which entities are blocking placement

### Direction Related Errors
- Only use valid direction enums (NORTHWEST is not a valid direction)
- Use standard directions: UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT

### Resource Management Errors
- Ensure required items are in inventory before attempting to insert them into chests
- Check if you have crafted necessary intermediate products before trying to use them

### Power System Issues
- Keep boilers fueled to maintain power generation
- Monitor power consumption and generation to ensure stable operation

### Inserter Setup Issues
- Ensure proper spacing between inserters and their target entities
- Verify inserter pickup and drop positions are not blocked
- Consider the direction of inserter placement relative to source and destination entities
